effects.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

layout_strategy.container: max-w-md mx-auto md:max-w-5xl min-h-screen bg-[#050505] text-white overflow-x-hidden relative

buttons.primary: bg-[#00FF94] text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-wider hover:bg-[#00CC76] transition-all shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(0,255,148,0.3)] rounded-none skew-x-[-10deg]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#FF0055] text-[#FF0055] font-bold uppercase hover:bg-[#FF0055] hover:text-white transition-all rounded-none skew-x-[-10deg]

cards.game_mode: relative overflow-hidden bg-[#0A0A0B] border border-white/10 hover:border-[#00FF94]/50 transition-all group p-6 flex flex-col items-center justify-center gap-4 aspect-square
cards.glass_panel: bg-black/60 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 rounded-xl p-6

inputs.default: bg-[#0A0A0B] border border-white/10 focus:border-[#00FF94] text-white placeholder:text-gray-600 rounded-lg h-12 px-4 w-full outline-none transition-colors font-mono

hero_bg.desc: Cyberpunk city background for landing page hero

general: Implement a 'Mobile-First' approach. Most users will be on phones.
Use the 'Unbounded' font for all headings to give that futuristic feel.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all numbers, timers, and financial data.
The background should be #050505. Do not use pure black #000000.
Add the noise texture overlay to the body to kill the digital flatness.
Use the 'primary_glow' shadow on the winning elements (Green).
Use the 'secondary_glow' shadow on the losing/alert elements (Red/Pink).

pages.home: Create a high-energy landing page. Hero section with the cyberpunk city bg. Grid of 4 game modes (30s, 1m, 3m, 5m) as the main CTA.
pages.game_room: This is the core. Needs a massive Countdown Timer at the top. Below it, the 'History Ribbon' showing last 10 results. Then the Betting Board (Green/Violet/Red buttons).
pages.wallet: Clean, secure look. Deposit form needs UTR input. Withdrawal form needs a progress bar showing 'Wager Requirement' (2x betting rule).
pages.admin: Dense data grid. Use a table component for Deposits/Withdrawals. Add 'Approve/Reject' buttons.

animations: Use 'framer-motion' for the Countdown Timer (ticking effect).
Animate the 'History Ribbon' when a new result comes in.
Add a 'Glitch' effect on the 'WIN' or 'LOSS' modal.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ğŸ¤–ğŸ§ ğŸ’­ğŸ’¡ğŸ”®ğŸ¯ğŸ“šğŸ­ğŸ¬ğŸªğŸ‰ğŸŠğŸğŸ€ğŸ‚ğŸ°ğŸˆğŸ¨ğŸ°ğŸ’°ğŸ’µğŸ’³ğŸ¦ğŸ’ğŸª™ğŸ’¸ğŸ¤‘ğŸ“ŠğŸ“ˆğŸ“‰ğŸ’¹ğŸ”¢ğŸ†ğŸ¥‡ etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories (especially sponsor logos) = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Create new components that match the style and conventions of existing components when needed
Examine existing components to understand the project's component patterns before creating new ones
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
Use sonner for toasts. Sonner component are located in /app/src/components/ui/sonner.tsx
